comments: The number k first occurs in century A186311(k).
references: George P. Loweke, The Lore of Prime Numbers. New York: Vantage Press (1982): 91.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9999
formula: a(n) = pi(100n+99) - pi(100n). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 03 2013
maple: with(numtheory); A038822 := n->pi(100*n+99)-pi(100*n); seq(A038822(k), k=0..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 03 2013
crossrefs: Cf. A186393-A186408 (centuries having 1 to 16 primes), A186509 (17 primes).
author: _Jeff Burch_
extensions: Edited, corrected and extended by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 29 2003
